description: Handles inbound and outbound customer inquiries related to life insurance policies, including policy details, premium payments, and basic claims support. Processes routine transactions and directs complex issues to specialized teams.

tasks.task_name: Retrieve and Display Policy Details
Calculate Premium Adjustments and Explain Changes
Process Premium Payment Requests
Respond to Policy Inquiry Follow-ups
Document Policy Modification Requests
Verify Policy Eligibility for Special Programs

Conduct Proactive Policy Review Calls
Follow Up on Lapsed or Inactive Policies
Promote New Products and Enhancements
Schedule and Conduct Customer Satisfaction Surveys
Escalate Unresolved Customer Issues
Coordinate with Specialized Departments
Document Issue Resolution and Lessons Learned
Manage Customer Complaints and Appeals

description: Provides first-line support for customers filing claims across all product lines, gathering initial claim information and guiding customers through the claims process. Coordinates with claims adjusters and maintains customer communication throughout claim lifecycle.

tasks.task_name: Collect Claimant Contact and Identification Information
Record Loss Details and Circumstances
Gather Medical or Death Certificate Information
Identify and Contact Beneficiaries
Document Witness Statements and Evidence
Create Preliminary Claim Summary
Explain Claim Process Steps and Timeline

Guide Claimants Through Appeal Process
Assist with Claim Form Completion
Schedule Claim Investigations and Inspections
Facilitate Communication Between Adjuster and Claimant
Track and Escalate Delayed Claims
Coordinate Third-Party Vendor Services
Notify Claimant of Claim Decision
Explain Claim Decision Rationale
Provide Emotional Support During Claim Process
Facilitate Payment Processing and Delivery

description: Manages complex health insurance inquiries including coverage interpretation, benefit explanations, and policy modifications for high-value accounts. Mentors junior representatives and handles escalated customer concerns with empathy and expertise.

workloads.workload_name: Complex Coverage Interpretation and Benefit Explanation

tasks.task_name: Analyze Policy Language and Coverage Exclusions
Explain Benefits and Out-of-Pocket Costs to Customers

Audit Account Changes for Accuracy
Investigate Root Causes of Customer Complaints
Develop Resolution Plans for Complex Issues
Negotiate and Mediate Customer Disputes
Document Escalation Details and Resolutions
Follow Up on Resolution Implementation
Identify Process Improvements from Escalations
Conduct Quality Assurance Reviews of Team Work
Provide Coaching and Feedback to Team Members
Mentor Junior Advisors on Complex Cases
Track and Report Quality Metrics
Develop Training Materials for Team Development
Identify Coaching Opportunities from QA Findings

description: Advises customers on property and casualty insurance coverage options, policy adjustments, and claims guidance for complex situations. Builds long-term customer relationships and identifies cross-sell opportunities while ensuring regulatory compliance.

tasks.task_name: Assess Customer Coverage Needs Through Discovery
Analyze Risk Profiles and Coverage Gaps

Guide Customers Through Claims Process

Appeal Claim Denials on Customer Behalf
Build Long-Term Customer Relationships

Identify Cross-Sell and Upsell Opportunities
Resolve Customer Issues Proactively
Maintain Customer Contact and Engagement Records
Gather Customer Feedback on Service Quality
Verify Policy Compliance with Regulatory Requirements
Maintain Accurate Policy Documentation
Prepare Compliance Reports and Audits
Monitor Regulatory Changes and Updates
Document Customer Disclosures and Acknowledgments
Conduct Internal Compliance Training

description: Provides technical support for customers experiencing issues with Acme's digital platforms, mobile app, and online account management tools. Troubleshoots login problems, system errors, and integration issues while documenting bugs for development teams.

tasks.task_name: Verify User Credentials and Account Status
Reset Password and Multi-Factor Authentication
Analyze Browser and Network Compatibility Issues
Review Session Timeout and Token Expiration Logs
Document Access Troubleshooting Steps and Solutions
Escalate Persistent Authentication Failures to Engineering
Collect Error Logs and System Diagnostics
Analyze Error Patterns and Root Cause Identification
Test Potential Fixes in Staging Environment
Implement Temporary Workarounds for Users
Monitor System Performance Post-Resolution
Communicate Resolution Status to Stakeholders
Identify Data Sync Discrepancies Between Systems
Diagnose API Integration Failures
Manually Reconcile and Correct Data Mismatches
Test Data Sync Workflows After Corrections
Document Integration Issues and Solutions
Coordinate with Development Team on Integration Fixes
Create Detailed Bug Reports with Reproduction Steps
Assign Priority and Severity Levels to Bugs
Coordinate Bug Fixes with Development Teams
Verify Bug Fixes in Release Candidates

description: Supports customers and internal teams using AI-powered tools for claims processing, underwriting, and customer service automation. Troubleshoots AI chatbot interactions, validates system outputs, and escalates algorithmic issues to data science teams.

tasks.task_name: Diagnose Chatbot Response Failures

description: Manages escalated claims disputes and customer complaints related to claim denials, delays, or coverage disputes. Investigates issues thoroughly, coordinates with claims adjusters and legal teams, and works toward resolution while maintaining customer satisfaction.

description: Evaluates the impact of AI and automation tools on customer experience, measuring adoption rates, satisfaction metrics, and efficiency gains. Recommends enhancements to AI-powered systems and identifies opportunities to balance automation with human touchpoints.

description: Systematically collects, analyzes, and synthesizes customer feedback through surveys, focus groups, and interviews to understand customer needs and expectations. Translates insights into actionable recommendations for product development and service improvements.
